name: Crudmire
response: Meet Crudmire, the troll who’s got more grease than sense! This little fella is obsessed with drilling, extracting, and refining—basically, he’s Black Gold’s biggest fanboy. The land? Just another resource to drain dry. He doesn’t care about insurance—he’d rather hurl it into the nearest chasm and call it a day. Pharma gets a grudging nod of approval from Crudmire, but crypto is where his heart truly lies. If Crypto were a boulder, he’d climb atop it and vow eternal devotion, even if it means living out his days as a sentient meme. Crudmire’s got one true passion, and it’s not love—it’s liquid gold, baby!
